i18n.title: Exploring Go's Range Keyword
i18n.description: The range keyword is used to iterate over elements in a variety of data structures in Golang. In this lab, we will explore how to use range with different data structures.

meta.title: Golang Range Iteration | Programming Tutorials | Lab
meta.description: Explore the usage of the `range` keyword in Golang for iterating over various data structures, including slices, arrays, maps, and strings.
meta.keywords: Golang, range, slices, arrays, maps, strings, programming tutorials

verify.name: Verify Go Program Outputs Correct Sum
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 探索 Go 语言的 range 关键字
i18n.description: 在 Go 语言中，range 关键字用于遍历各种数据结构中的元素。在本实验中，我们将探索如何在不同的数据结构中使用 range。

meta.title: Go 语言范围迭代 | 编程教程 | 实验
meta.description: 探索 Go 语言中 range 关键字在遍历各种数据结构（包括切片、数组、映射和字符串）中的用法。
meta.keywords: Go 语言, range, 切片, 数组, 映射, 字符串, 编程教程
